document_data.name: Silver
document_data.mainbody:
{{Otheruses4|the house of Cormyrian nobility|other uses|Silver (disambiguation)}}

The '''Silver''' family was an ancient [[Cormyr]]ian house that split into three separate houses sometime between [[26 DR]] and [[245 DR]]. These houses were [[House Crownsilver|Crownsilver]], [[Huntsilver]], and [[Truesilver]].
document_data.Members:
* [[Jaquor Silver]], twin brother to Tristan.
* [[Tristan Silver]], twin brother to Jaquor.
